page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO 04320123
page.content: Our block consists of a piece of rural Hampshire. The block is cut into two distinct sections by three features. Two of the features are man made, a{railway line}running from{ {Romsey}to{Salisbury}and a {road}the{ {A3057}from{Romsey}to{Stockbridge}and one natural the famous trout stream{ {The River Test.}The {railway}is south of the river and the{road}to the north. Both closely follow the course of{The River Test.}To the northeast are the twin settlements of{Timsbury} and{Michelmersh}and to the southwest are{Awbridge}and{Ratley.}In conjunction with {The Test}are several large areas of still water belonging to private clubs or individuals. The {Test Valley}is wide and flat and we were able to see right across the area we were surveying whether in{Awbridge} or{Michelmersh.
